about_the_game:
A flash back to the past! This Victorian-inspired mansion tileset is ready for your rich person’s elegant manor, a palace, or even grandma’s house.

The Victorian Mansion Tileset includes:

Ground and Wall Tiles:

FORTY types of walls – interior, exterior, ranging from plain to super-detailed.
grass, dirt and ground cover
animated water and waterfall
rock and flower path
cracks for walls
adjustable table
fences
and more!

Also featuring:

stairs
multiple windows and curtains
fireplaces
multiple kinds of cabinets
pianos
chairs
bathroom fixtures
multiple beds
food
clocks
shelf decorations
toys
lots of doors
paintings
garden statues
ironwork fences and decor
lampposts
huge gazebo
fountains
architecture pieces for house exteriors
and more!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
